messages.message: सर्वेक्षण अब पूरा हो गया है. आप अपने समय के लिए धन्यवाद.

Are you thinking of buying a new phone in the next one month?

And would this phone be a SmartPhone? By SmartPhone we mean a phone that apart from making calls, has features to handle a Task List, Appointment list , Your Calendar, Integrated messaging, apps to integrate with FaceBook, Twitter, play games, a dedicated App store?
